author: bartokm
body: Updating the folders of the MonitorElements in Pixel DQM packages. In the future a second layer of DQM process will go on at HLT level, and this would conflict with the original one's folders. In order to avoid that, the base folders of the MonitorElements are set in the python configuration files. The necessary modifications for this can be seen in the PR.
title: DQM pixel update strings
